entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 8:55 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
